__________________________________________________________________________


Haunting flute music and entrancing vocals reveal the power of contemporary Native American music from the U.S. and Canada. --Putumayo.com

Drawing on contemplative sounds from Wales to Tibet and Armenia to Uganda, Native America is a collection of music by singer-songwriters and instrumentalists who draw inspiration from the traditions of their indigenous North American ancestors. A collage of styles, the songs on this album are united by the themes of connecting the old with the new and cultivating the continued evolution of music rooted in ancient traditions. With sounds ranging from atmospheric flute and drum to soulful acoustic songs by singer-songwriters, the collection provides listeners a glimpse into the diverse world of contemporary Native American music from what is now the U.S. and Canada. --Putumayo.com


If you have any special requests for other Putumayo records, let me know and I'll see what I can do.
